sourcesContent:
Crear cuenta

{/* Nombre */}
setFullName(e.target.value)} required className="w-full border border-gray-300 p-2 rounded focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-400" />
{/* Email */}
setEmail(e.target.value)} required className="w-full border border-gray-300 p-2 rounded focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-400" />
{/* Usuario */}
setUsername(e.target.value)} required className="w-full border border-gray-300 p-2 rounded focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-400" />
{/* Contraseña */}
setPassword(e.target.value)} required className="w-full border border-gray-300 p-2 rounded focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-400" />
{/* Repetir contraseña */}
setConfirmPassword(e.target.value)} required className="w-full border border-gray-300 p-2 rounded focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-400" />
{/* Aceptar términos */}
setAcceptTerms(e.target.checked)} /> Acepto los{' '}
{/* Botón Registrar */} {/* Link a login */}

¿Ya tienes una cuenta?{' '}
